short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that allows you to customize the colors of GitHub issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can change the background color of your GitHub issues. Three issue type avaliable at the moment:
- Issues (general items)
- Stories (items with "size" label)
- Subtasks (issues related to Stories)
